challenge.title: The Island of Truth and Lies

content.description: You find yourself on a peculiar island inhabited by two groups of people: the Truth-tellers, who always speak the truth, and the Liars, who always lie. You meet three inhabitants: A, B, and C. You know that A says that B is a liar. B says that A and C are in the same group. C claims that 'I am not a liar'. Using only this information, determine which of the inhabitants are Truth-tellers and which are Liars.
